storyInfo: The knights still have a long road ahead of them. But in this developing era, knighthood is destined to die.

attributes.content: As I am now, I don't think I have the patience to sit down to read a book––
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: ––Margaret.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Viviana. When did it happen?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: If I had to say though, it would probably be the moment I charged into the Major without steeling my resolve.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: You're welcome to stay.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've thought about it before. After all, the Grand Knight Territory still has a knight like you.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: But, this is also the choice I've made.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Choice?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You know, when I decided to draw my sword so that you and the Blood Knight could go on that fantastic adventure, I was actually... very excited.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Don't go all quiet on me, it's making me embarrassed...
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: It's not the kind of experience you get to have every day. Fighting for others, for a greater ideal, for something that seems unobtainable.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Maybe after leaving Leithanien, I never really lived as a knight.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: You aren't staying after all? If you leave, it'll be playing right into their hands.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Let me put this another way, Margaret. Don't 'let' me stay. Beg me to come back. I'll come back for sure.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: But for now, I'll follow the Nova Knightclub's 'arrangements'... and stay for a while in a remote city.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: It'll be a fresh and exciting adventure.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: What about the other knights, your friends?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The few that I do have, aren't they all here already?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: I'm honored.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: At least let me see you off.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Sure. Having the champion see me off would be a great honor of my own.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Oh, right. I forgot about this book when I was packing up. You can have it though, so that works out nicely.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: A poetry anthology?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: 'Twin Moons and Marigold'.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Hmm... I'm not familiar with Leithanien's literary scene...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The wonderful thing about symbolism and metaphors is that you're not forced to come up with a single concrete answer.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Just like the Radiant Knight and her deeds.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: My ride's on its way. Do you see it?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I wonder if the Grand Knight Territory will be different the next time I'm back?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: You know as well as I that this country won't change so easily.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But at least, I want knights to be called knights once more.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Good. Remember your promise, Margaret.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Sorry to keep you waiting, esteemed Candle Knight. Whenever you're ready.
attributes.name: An Escorting Knight

attributes.content: Oh, what a surprise. Good day to you as well, esteemed Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: An Escorting Knight

attributes.content: Hello.
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: Are we leaving right now?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Ah, yes... You'll be the last passenger. The Catastrophe Messenger is also ready.
attributes.name: An Escorting Knight

attributes.content: Alright. I hope it's a lovely city.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Until next time.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: See you again, Viviana.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: She's gone. You're still not coming out?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: If I remember correctly, you're...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: General Chamber of Commerce spokesman, McKee... But now that the Major is over, I won't have that title for much longer.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Maybe it's time for you to take a stand.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The affairs of Madam Droste and the Nova Knightclub have always been my responsibility.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I was just carrying carrying out my last assignment. But by the looks of things, I was too late. What a shame.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You... I see.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The way Madam Droste was mistreated... has everything to do with you.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Radiant Knight, we are now enemies, given what you did at the Major.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: That's not quite accurate, Spokesman.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It's just that we're committed to our own beliefs, and fight for our own ideals and justice.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That is... assuming the General Chamber still has ideals, and isn't just relying on others to line their pockets.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I didn't expect you to be this sharp-witted.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I'm just stating facts.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Alright then.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: So this is where the Candle Knight is going to live. Not a bad place.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But I'd write her a couple letters, if I were you. She might not be as strong as you think.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The City of Saplings and Artisans, Ognisko.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Oh right... What business do you have over there?
attributes.name: An Escorting Knight

attributes.content: What business, huh...?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Maybe I want to try my hand at poetry. The name of the city is pretty poetic, isn't it?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Haha, a bumpkin like me wouldn't dare prattle on in front of someone like you.
attributes.name: An Escorting Knight

attributes.content: You're too modest.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Are you looking forward to the next chapter of your life?
attributes.name: An Escorting Knight

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Maybe. It really might make for a nice poem.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: What do you want, pegasus?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I'm not sure if the knights still remember this, as it isn't something taught in the history books.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: The so-called 'Khaganquest.' The true name of the ceremony is––
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: (Ancient language) The Khaganquest that crosses the heavens.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: What... do you know...?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: When Nightzmora warriors came of age, they would head to a trial site of their choosing, under the watchful eyes of their family and tribe leader.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: The ancient race's traditions always believed 'self-reflection' to be the ultimate test. Confidence or arrogance, caution or cowardice; all would come to light.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: Not all Nightzmora tribes had this tradition though. Only a few examples of similar rituals can be found in historical texts.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: There is but one exception. One single person spent an entire lifetime completing that Khaganquest, and that person has entered history.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: Tola. We assumed your grandfather to be deceased, but not only did he survive, he also continued the Nightzmora bloodline.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: Pegasus!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Anger... Your birthplace is hundreds upon thousands of leagues from the Grand Knight Territory. Did you come all this way to become a knight, rampaging your way through the arena, just to vent this anger?
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: ––And yet, I still dare not raise my blade against you! Pathetic!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Who the hell are you?!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Just an old, feeble campaign knight. Put your blade down, young Nightzmora.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: I wasn't done with my story. That man who did not complete his Khaganquest until he reached death's door, began his journey in the once-lush grasslands of eastern Ursus.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: He stood in the middle of the vast prairies, looking out across the wide land, and made a promise to his tribe and to his brothers and sisters–
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: His Khaganquest would cross the kingdoms of the hippogryphs and the pegasi. He would topple the exalted throne of the Gaulish Emperor, and tear down Leithanien's thousand Spires...
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: In the final ten years of his life, he did indeed complete his Khaganquest as promised. The great Khagan flayed the entire world, burned away the previous epoch, and set his sights on the border of human civilization.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: Your ancestors accomplished great things. Tola, you are a part of the Khagan genealogy... the last descendant, living right before our eyes.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: Hah! The Kheshigs' greatest accomplishment was pulling the pedantic wisemen like the pegasi from their thrones!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: But look at you!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Even as they looked down on us from high, what have the pegasi done but watch as those pathetic jesters tore down the era of knights?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Take a good look at yourself! What about you resembles a knight?! What is that slender ceremonial toothpick at your waist going to block?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: In Kazimierz, I need not draw my blade on anyone.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: ––Nice joke!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Also, we were not watching idly.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: We simply did not have the ability to turn back time.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: Grr...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I'm not interested in fossils who've lost their will to fight... Out of my way.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Then where is the place you plan to begin your trials?
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: That's not for you to know, pegasus.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: But you no longer have a leader to answer to, or a family to return to.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: You have no plans to come back.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: Vogelweide told me everything, Nightzmora.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: I've watched your matches. I can't stop you from leaving.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: After you've completed your journey, if you still wish to return to Kazimierz, you can become a great knight and step onto the battlefield honorably.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: People of your kind are rare, and you are an exceptionally rare talent bearing the Khagan's blood.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: Though that bloodline no longer runs thick, I do believe you'll always be an excellent warrior. You deserve a chance to experience true, glorious combat.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: So arrogant.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You and all the knights I've seen the entire way across Kazimierz have all been the same. Arrogant.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Fighting for you, fighting for this eyesore of a country, is supposed to be glorious?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I simply do not wish to see such a promising sapling seek out its own death.
attributes.name: Ioleta

attributes.content: Hah. My choices are mine alone, pegasus!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Leave. Get out of my way. Leaving this city is only the beginning of my journey!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Hmm? Huh? Whaaaat?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: A knight? Why are you here? The elder never told us we'd get a Grand Knight to visit...
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: I bought a plot of land nearby.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Ohhh! You must be the knight who bought old Jackie's plot! Ahh, a pleasure to meet you!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Umm, please forgive me if I guess wrong, but judging by your dusky red armor and your sturdy posture, your title... what was your title again?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Hm... I'm not a knight anymore.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Then, if I could be so bold, you... might you be...
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Dikaiopolis, the Blood Knight?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: I was once called that.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: My god... You, you really are...
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: All of us are huge fans! Why did you retire all of a sudden? You and the Radiant Knight... Ah! If you're out here, you must be in some money trouble, right? I mean, just ask and–
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: No, no, what am I even saying? I'm so sorry... You're the great champion, of course you'd have more money than us... Come, come, I'll show you around...
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Yes. Alright.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Look, right here is the biggest shop in the village. The old master's not doing so great these days, and now his daughter's taken over...
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Oh? And who might this knight be?
attributes.name: A Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: We were just talking about him too. Crazy coincidence isn't it? He's the one who bought that plot! Take a guess at who he is–
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: No, right now, I'm–
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: It's the Blood Knight! The champion! The Blood Knight, Dikaiopolis!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: The champion? Is it really him?
attributes.name: An Onlooker

attributes.content: The Blood Knight is coming to stay with us?!
attributes.name: An Onlooker

attributes.content: Th-The Blood Knight?? In the flesh??
attributes.name: A Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Oh, I'm so sorry! Ahem, I let myself get carried away there. Here, if there's anything you ever need... Just let me know, and I'll get it for you. Don't worry about the rest!
attributes.name: A Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: I mean it! No need to be shy!
attributes.name: A Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: In that case... what crops do you have here?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: C-Crops, you say? Normally, we purchase all the seeds we need for the village in bulk, but if you have any special requests, I'll arrange it for you!
attributes.name: A Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: Just out of curiosity, do olive trees grow here?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Olive trees? Th-The kind from Minos? Hold on, maybe the village elder will know...
attributes.name: A Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: Don't worry. It's not urgent.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Just let me know when you find out.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: I-It's no problem at all! I'll be right back!
attributes.name: A Grocery Store Owner

attributes.content: Oh my, where are my manners... Am I being a bother? Hey! Give him some space! He must be tired after coming all the way here from the city!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Over here, sir! I'll walk you back!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: One moment.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: If you recognize me, then you also should know... that I am an Infected.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Hm? An Infected... Oh, yes, right, you're an Infected knight.
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: You're not afraid of Oripathy?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Of course we are!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: But what of it?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Then you all should keep your distance from me.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Ohhh, that's what you meant... Right, you are an Infected after all. I'm sorry, I was way too excited.
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: But still, don't you need people to help you out every now and then?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: See, farming isn't something you can just jump right into... Um, you don't have any prior experience, right?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: There are a few students in the village. When I head back, I'll ask them if they know if you can grow olives here... Oh, that's right, about the Oripathy. Um...
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Can they treat Oripathy in the city?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Not effectively. That's why I chose the plot of land farthest from the village. If you don't have any particular business with me, it's better to stay away. It's very dangerous.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Then, do you think I can get an autograph first?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: ...Heh.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: What's your name?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Me? Oh, haha... I forgot to introduce myself. They all just call me the old dentist. You can call me that too if you'd like.
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: If there's anything I need help with, I'll be sure to ask.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: But at least right now, I need to...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Sir?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: ...Haha.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: 'Go home first.' Need a change of clothes too. Can't always be walking around in a full suit of armor. Why don't you head back home for now?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Right, right, I should do that!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Well, I won't keep you any longer, Sir! See you later!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: ...*cough*
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: *Hack!* *cough* *cough* ––
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Whew. I really do need to hurry back... and grab a change of clothes... *cough*...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Wow... I never expected to actually meet the Blood Knight in person... I can still hardly believe it!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Hm? But now that I think about it, when did he announce his retirement? And he even chose to come to a place this far out in the sticks... I wonder if there's some other reason he can't talk about? Hmm...
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Hmm? Another visitor? Since when is our sleepy little village so lively? Maybe living in the big city really isn't all it's chalked up to be, haha!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Hello there! Where are you from? The road ends up ahead! Come this way!
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Villager

attributes.content: Good day to you, mister.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ■■ years later, Northern Ursus, 'Border of Civilization'
1:43 P.M. \ Light snow
Why are we still out on patrol on such a cold day?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer A

attributes.content: Stop your whining... There's not so much as a village around these parts, only a Sami observatory a bit further off... Well, it actually belongs to a Columbian.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: That's strange!
attributes.name: Ursus Officer A

attributes.content: I heard–– but this is only a rumor, that yesterday, a Sami priest of some sort was in a real hurry to see the boss.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: A Sami priest? Oh, you must be talking about those snowpriests. Why are those terrible things crossing the border all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer A

attributes.content: Hell if I know. Well above our pay grade though. Not something we need to know... Just keep your head down and your eyes fixed on the endless snow in front of you. Each and every day, 'til your eyes hurt.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: Fair enough–– Wait, slow down!
attributes.name: Ursus Officer A

attributes.content: Up ahead... Are you seeing that over there?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer A

attributes.content: Is that... a horn?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: Looks like it's been left here for a while too... I don't see any wheel markings or footsteps. What do we do?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer A

attributes.content: Let's head back and report it to the boss. There shouldn't be any man-made objects around here... Can you tell what this horn might've been used for?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: Doesn't look to be anything Sami at least. Seems pretty old, and worn out.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: Did you hear that, or am I just imagining things?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: Huh? Probably just imagining things.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer A

attributes.content: Anyway, let's get in touch with the team first. Still got a working connection?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer A

attributes.content: 7th Expedition Team, 7th Expedition Team. We've discovered a... horn of some sort. Yes, no other markings nearby...
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: Hold on, it's that sound again!
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: Expedition Team, Expedition Team! We've found something else nearby! We'll contact you again in ten minutes!
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: Hey, look over there! Since when was there a forest that way?
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: Quick, hand me the spyglass!
attributes.name: Ursus Officer B

attributes.content: According to the 7th Expedition Team's intel, two Ursus patrols found an 'army' at the far northern border.
And when they followed the trail of the 'army', they reportedly heard the sounds of war drums and clashing weapons, but could not find traces of any people.
The only thing left behind was an abandoned horn, nothing else.
The Sami individual denied doing anything, and the Columbian observatory only further corroborated this denial. The snowy land was shining peacefully, as far as the eye could see.
There was only a single row of footprints gradually disappearing into the thick snow, extending past the far north, beyond the border of civilization.
